name: Orbital Station Z - RemakeJam2 Edition
description:
Made for Remake Jam 2:  Week of 6/3/2018-6/11/2018

Grab a weapon and defend yourself after incoming waves of Enemy attackes.

Slimes - mindless drones leaving a trail of slime as the charge the player, fast moving and massive claws will make quick work of the player.

Battle Tanks - Slower moving heavy assault platforms, firing a slow, yet devistating bolt of plasma melting armor and flesh.

Hive Queens - slow moving boss enemy. Massive damage to anyone who finds themselves trapped in their powerful jaws. will spawn every 3 waves.

Two years after the Original, converted to 3D with all new code and graphics

Original GamePlay: 

Music: Phantom From Space - by kevin macleod https://incompetech.com/wordpress/
